sentences.en: a foul crime/murder
sentences.cn: 邪恶的罪行；恶毒的谋杀

sentences.en: a pile of foul-smelling garbage
sentences.cn: 一堆臭烘烘的垃圾

sentences.en: A series of technical foul-ups delayed the launch of the new product.
sentences.cn: 一系列技术问题延误了新产品的上市。

sentences.en: by fair means or foul.
sentences.cn: 只有重新掌权他们才会满意——为此他们将不择手段。

sentences.en: Collins was in a foul mood even before the interviews began.
sentences.cn: 柯林斯在采访还没开始时就暴躁不安起来。

sentences.en: extractor fans to remove foul air from the tunnel
sentences.cn: 排出隧道污浊空气的排气扇

sentences.en: He had a foul mouth.
sentences.cn: 他爱说脏话。

sentences.en: He had fallen foul of the FBI.
sentences.cn: 他已经惹恼了联邦调查局。

sentences.en: He put down his mug of foul-tasting coffee.
sentences.cn: 他放下手中一大杯难喝的咖啡。

sentences.en: He was in a foul mood because he had been stood up.
sentences.cn: 他因女友爽约而心情不好。

sentences.en: He woke up with a foul taste in his mouth.
sentences.cn: 他醒过来，嘴里一股臭味。

sentences.en: leaders should admit when they completely foul things up.
sentences.cn: 领导人把事情完全搞糟时应该自己承认。

sentences.en: Local detectives have ruled out foul play.
sentences.cn: 当地的侦探已经排除了他杀的可能性。

sentences.en: One of the judges thought it was a foul throw.
sentences.cn: 有个裁判认为投球犯规.

sentences.en: Players were warned twice for foul play.
sentences.cn: 运动员们因为犯规动作被警告了两次。

sentences.en: Refugees in the camps are short of food and at risk from foul water.
sentences.cn: 营中难民缺少食物，还面临水源污染的危险。

sentences.en: Steve Vickers was yellow-carded for a foul on Hunt.
sentences.cn: 史蒂夫·维克斯因对亨特犯规被出示黄牌。

sentences.en: The city is covered by a foul-smelling cloud of smoke.
sentences.cn: 城市被一团恶臭的烟云笼罩着。

sentences.en: The language is foul and the violence horribly realistic.
sentences.cn: 语言污秽，暴力场面非常写实。

sentences.en: The play was full of filthy foul language.
sentences.cn: 这部戏充斥着猥亵粗俗的语言。

sentences.en: There are serious risks that laboratories may foul up these tests.
sentences.cn: 实验室很有可能搞砸这些试验。

sentences.en: When he came back, he was in a foul mood.
sentences.cn: 他回来时，心情糟透了。

words.tran_cn: 犯规；弄脏；淤塞；缠住，妨害

phrases.tran_cn: 破坏（或伤害）自己（或自己的利益）
&I{【体育运动】} 因犯规超过规定次数被罚下场
严重犯规；不公平的比赛；不正当行为

phrases.phrase: foul something up ( 或 foul up)

phrases.tran_cn: 因错误或粗心而犯大错
个人犯规；侵人犯规；犯则；侵人

trans.tran_cn: [体]违反规则的，犯规的，邪恶的，难闻的，有恶臭的，下流的

trans.tran_en: an action in a sport that is against the rules
to make something very dirty, especially with waste

trans.tran_cn: 弄脏，使污秽，使纠缠，使阻塞
trans.tran_en: to make something very dirty, especially with waste

trans.tran_cn: 纠缠，纠结，[体]违反规则的
